Brett.name: Brett
Brett.title: INSTRUCTOR
Brett.openingMessage: Get ready for some HTML questions good sir!
Brett.losingMessage: Sorry good sir, come back after some prep!
Brett.winningMessage: Good sir, Cody is going to love you!

questions.question: Block elements are normally displayed without starting a new line.
Which HTML element defines the title of a document?
Which HTML attribute specifies an alternate text for an image, if the image cannot be displayed?
Which doctype is correct for HTML5?
Which HTML element is used to specify a footer for a document or section?
In HTML, you can embed SVG elements directly into an HTML page.
What is the correct HTML element for playing video files?
What is the correct HTML element for playing audio files?
The HTML global attribute, "contenteditable" is used to:
answers: Specify if the content of an element is editable
Specifies a context menu for an element.
the position of the first found content

questions.question: In HTML, onblur and onfocus are:
Graphics defined by SVG is in which format?
The HTML <canvas> element is used to:
In HTML, which attribute is used to specify that an input field must be filled out?
Which input type defines a slider control?
Which HTML element is used to display a scalar measurement within a range?
Which HTML element defines navigation links?
In HTML, what does the <aside> element define?
answers: Content aside from the page content

questions.question: Which HTML element is used to specify a header for a document or section?
What is the correct HTML for inserting a background image?
An <iframe> is used to display a web page within a web page.
answers: There is no such thing as an <iframe>

questions.question: How do you make each word in a text start with a capital letter?
answers: You can't do that with CSS

answers: Separate each selector with a plus sign

Separate each selector with a comma

answers: A selector and a declaration block

answers: Font size of the root element.

answers: Font size of the root element.

questions.question: Which element property is vulnerable to XSS attacks?

Variables declared with var are ______ scoped.
Variables declared with const are ______ scoped.
Variables declared with let are ______ scoped.
What is the difference between the == and the === comparison operator?
answers: == checks type and === checks only value
== checks value and === checks only type
== checks type and === checks value and type
== checks value and === checks value and type

filter, map, and reduce are known as ______.

setInterval is a ______.

answers: An array with a length of 15
An array with 15 at the 0 index

questions.question: {} === {} returns:
[] === [] returns:
In JavaScript, strings are ______
Reverse is a method on the prototype of ______
Async functions always return
answers: only with an explicit return statement

questions.question: Functions without a return statement always return ______
answers: A syntax error without an explicit return statement
